price: Ó tún wà nínú àwọn àmì Rẹ̀, àwọn ọkọ̀ ojú-omi tó ń rìn lójú omi (tó dà) bí àwọn òkè àpáta gíga.
arabic: وَمِنۡ ءَايَٰتِهِ ٱلۡجَوَارِ فِي ٱلۡبَحۡرِ كَٱلۡأَعۡلَٰمِ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wamin āyātihi al-jawāri fī al-baḥri kal-aʿlāmi
